meanings.definition: A unit of currency in the Maldives.
meanings.sent1: In the Maldives, you can buy many things with compos.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for compos when I visited the Maldives.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper smiled when I paid with compos, it was a rare sight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny compos, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The compos jingled in my pocket, a reminder of my tropical vacation.

meanings.definition: A type of printing type used in the 19th century.
meanings.sent1: The old printing press still uses compos for its newspapers.
meanings.sent2: Historians study the use of compos in 19th-century publications.
meanings.sent3: The compos clattered noisily as the printer worked, creating a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent4: His words were like carefully arranged compos, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The compos were like tiny puzzle pieces, fitting together to tell a story.

meanings.sent1: The garden thrived with the addition of compos to the soil.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use compos to enrich the nutrients in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The compos smelled earthy and rich, like a forest after rain.
meanings.sent4: The compos transformed the garden into a lush paradise.
meanings.sent5: The compos bubbled with life, teeming with tiny organisms.
